name: Rainbow Avalanche
description:
This is a gravity puzzle in the realm of Bejeweled, but with some twists to make it more luck-focused.

Touch one of the pieces on the board to erase every other on it that has the same color, and gain points for the groups of 3 falling pieces of the same color that group toguether. Each play spends one coin from the meter on the side, but if you make enough points you'll earn another coin.

See how many plays you can string together by causing chain reactions of popping pieces.

This was my first game only using C++ and SFML, and it was made in one week.

Controls:

Mouse left or right: select pieces;

Space: reset game;

C: add coins;

N: remove coins;
